meanings.sent1: The burstier balloon popped louder than the others.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was burstier than I expected.
meanings.sent3: The burstier balloon made a big noise when it burst.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was burstier than a firework on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The burstier sound of the balloon bursting startled everyone.

meanings.sent1: The burstier was known for his loud sneezes.
meanings.sent2: The burstier in the room made everyone jump.
meanings.sent3: The burstier always surprises us with unexpected sounds.
meanings.sent4: She's a burstier when it comes to sharing exciting news.
